system.description: Wyrms are the @L[Creature:Sea Serpent]{sea serpents} of the land.
system.appearance: Like a smaller, longish dragon without wings.
system.hpIncrease: Gain another hit die for every 1 additional size.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Battle Roar Aura]{Battle Roar Aura} and @L[Keyword:Improved]{Improved} @L[Ability:Battle Cry]{Battle Cry}.
This ability cannot affect @L[Condition:Deaf]{deaf} creatures.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Battle Cry Aura]{Battle Cry Aura} and @L[Ability:Battle Cry Resistance]{Battle Cry Resistance}.
This ability cannot affect @L[Condition:Deaf]{deaf} creatures.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} being @L[Condition:Frightened]{frightened}.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: Your @L[Category:AV granting abilities]{natural armor} is @L[Property:Dragon Scale]{dragon scale}.

results.hit: Target is @L[Condition:Dead]{dead}, @L[Condition:Ruined]{ruined}, and their @L[Core:Size]{SIZE} is reduced by 2. If their @L[Core:Size]{SIZE} was already 2 or less, their body is completely consumed.

overview.base: At the start of each of your @L[Core:Turns]{turns}, you @L[Core:Healing]{heal} and regain that many @L[Core:HP]{HP}. This does not consume your @L[Core:HP]{hit die}. If you take @L[Damage:Fire]{fire damage}, this effect doesn't apply on your next @L[Core:Turns]{turn}.
At the start of each of your @L[Core:Turns]{turns}, you @L[Core:Revitalizing]{revitalize} and regain that many @L[Core:MP]{MP}. This does not consume your @L[Core:MP]{mana die}.
You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @L[Ability:Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.

You gain @L[Ability:Supernatural Strength]{Supernatural Strength}. In addition, you deal @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted} with all melee @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attacks} and they are @L[Keyword:AV0]{AV0} for you.

You gain @L[Ability:Giant Strength]{Giant Strength} and @L[Ability:Shattering Grip]{Shattering Grip}. In addition, you may @L[Keyword:Deboosted]{deboost} any melee @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} to make it @L[Keyword:AV0]{AV0}.

You gain @L[Ability:Improved Strength]{Improved Strength} and @L[Ability:Melee Damage Boost]{Melee Damage Boost}. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of @L[Property:Cumbersome]{cumbersome} items.
You gain @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} and @L[Ability:Improved Armor Piercing]{Improved Armor Piercing}.

Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
Melee weapons you use are @L[Property:Armor Piercing]{armor piercing}.
You may spend an unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage} again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a @L[Category:Damaging effects]{damaging} melee @L[Category:Weapon delivery abilities]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}.

overview.base: Target is @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered}.
You always have at least 4 @L[Core:AV]{AV}. This is the case even when you are not wearing @L[Category:Armor]{armor}.
You gain @L[Ability:Bite]{Bite} and become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @L[Category:Equipment]{mouth} is @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
